Articles.Content:
I went on eva but saw only black and because i have the Through The Eyes Of A Kerbal i decided to go into first person view on my kerbal and it got fixed but then the v key stopped making the camera view changing from auto/orbital and the IVA from changing kerbal, is this a new problem or has anyone else had this problem.

BTW my KSP version is 1.12.2

nvm i fixed it by reinstalling

how do i say a question has been answered
